languages.text:
Верный соратник жнеца алых бранных полей,
Щедрый кормитель земли влагой жизни нечистой,
Гордо дарящий врагу милосердие Волчье,
В громе ударов твоих о броню
Слышу я смех Всеотца
И ликую.

Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
猩红的战场上，
收割者忠实的伙伴，
无比慷慨。
以邪恶的生命滋养大地，
对敌人施以狼群的仁慈。
在你雷霆万钧的击打中，
我听到了全父放声大笑，
欢欣不已。
languages.original_text:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.

traits.locale_text:
猩红的战场上，
收割者忠实的伙伴，
无比慷慨。
以邪恶的生命滋养大地，
对敌人施以狼群的仁慈。
在你雷霆万钧的击打中，
我听到了全父放声大笑，
欢欣不已。

languages.text:
緋色の戦場にありし
命刈る者の忠実な片割れよ、
邪なる命をもって大地を
惜しみもなく肥し、
敵に狼の慈悲を授ける者よ、
その鎧の一撃がとどろく中、
全知の父の笑い声を聞く、
これぞ我が喜び。
languages.original_text:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.

languages.text:
Fiel acompañante de la parca
y los frentes teñidos de escarlata.
Siega vidas perversas
para dar sustento a la tierra,
así como lupina misericordia al enemigo.
Entre el chocar de las armaduras,
oigo la risa del Padre de todas las cosas
y en ella hallo júbilo.
languages.original_text:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.

languages.text:
Fidèles compagnons de la faucheuse
des champs de bataille écarlates,
vous qui nourrissez généreusement
la terre de vies impies
et accordez la miséricorde du Loup
à vos ennemis vaincus,
dans le fracas de vos armes retentissantes,
j'entends résonner le rire du Père de Tous,
qui emplit mon cœur d'une joie ineffable.
languages.original_text:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.

languages.text:
Treuer Gefährte des Schnitters
auf roten Schlachtfeldern,
bewässert großzügig
die Erde mit bösem Leben.
So zeigt der Wolf Gnade mit dem Feind.
Im Donner der gepanzerten Schläge
höre ich das Lachen des Allvaters
und freue mich daran.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Kanlı cephelerdeki
Ölüm meleğinin sadık yoldaşı.
Dünyayı çılgın bir hayatla
Dolduran cömert arkadaşı!
Kurt'un merhametidir düşmana
Zırhının kükreyen fırtınası.
Mutluluk verir bana
Yücebaba'nın kahkahası.
languages.original_text:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,

and I rejoice.

Mutluluk verir bana.
